Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Finding by Site or System/Connective and Soft Tissue Finding/Synovitis,/NCIThesaurus/Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Other Finding/Inflammation/Synovitis
Record.Description: Inflammation of a synovial membrane. It is usually painful, particularly on motion, and is characterized by a fluctuating swelling due to effusion within a synovial sac. (Dorland, 27th ed)
